product_summary: Scribewave is an online transcription and subtitling tool powered by AI. It supports 90+ languages and dialects, and can handle all major audio and video file formats. Scribewave offers a variety of features, including automatic transcription, speaker recognition, editing, and export to multiple formats. It is a valuable tool for journalists, researchers, content creators, and anyone who needs to transcribe audio or video files.
product_pros: Can handle all major audio and video file formats
product_cons: Can be slow to transcribe long files
May not be able to accurately transcribe all accents
Can be difficult to edit transcripts
Does not offer a free trial
Limited features in the free plan

product_usecases.details: Scribewave can be used to transcribe interviews for research, journalism, or other purposes. It can accurately transcribe multiple speakers, even in noisy environments.

Scribewave can be used to create subtitles for videos in any language. It can automatically generate subtitles, or you can manually edit them. Scribewave also offers a variety of features for customizing subtitles, such as font, size, and color.

Scribewave can be used to translate audio or video files into over 90 languages. It uses machine translation to generate translations, which can then be edited manually. Scribewave is a valuable tool for anyone who needs to communicate with people who speak different languages.

Scribewave can be used to create transcripts for podcasts. It can automatically transcribe audio files, and you can then edit the transcripts to remove errors and improve readability. Scribewave also offers a variety of features for formatting transcripts, such as adding timestamps and speaker labels.

Scribewave can be used to create transcripts for webinars. It can automatically transcribe audio files, and you can then edit the transcripts to remove errors and improve readability. Scribewave also offers a variety of features for formatting transcripts, such as adding timestamps and speaker labels.

product_toolfor.details: Scribewave can help journalists transcribe interviews, create transcripts for podcasts, and translate audio or video files.
Scribewave can help researchers transcribe interviews, create transcripts for research papers, and translate audio or video files.
Scribewave can help content creators create subtitles for videos, transcribe audio or video files, and translate audio or video files.
Scribewave can help students transcribe lectures, create transcripts for study notes, and translate audio or video files.
Scribewave can help businesses create transcripts for meetings, create subtitles for videos, and translate audio or video files.
